column1: Traffic reports will resume Tuesday August 13 at 4:00 p.m.

column3: Traffic Alert for Nicholasville Rd at Dundee Dr:
column4: The inbound middle and right lanes will be closed starting at approximately 9 a.m. for emergency gas main repair.

column3: Traffic Alert for Nicholasville Rd at Dundee Dr:
column4: Motorists can expect long delays if traveling in this area.  The lanes will be closed until repairs are complete.
